name: The Rolling Scopes Conference
description: A conference with a clever name that makes you think of the Rolling Stones. The conference will cover topics like Javascript. There will be coffee and croissants in the morning and beer and burgers at night.

name: VueJS Conference
description: A conference with author of VueJS. The conference will be about everything Vue. There will be coffee and croissants in the morning.

name: Frontend NE: The Conference
description: A conference in England. I could possibly be cool. It might also be boring. The conference will cover a broad range of Front End topics like Javascript, CSS, HTML. There will be coffee and croissants in the morning and beer and burgers at night.

name: Bulgaria Web Summit 2018
description: A conference in Bulgara in April. The conference will cover a broad range of Front End topics like Javascript, CSS, HTML. There will be coffee and croissants in the morning and beer and burgers at night.

name: ReactEurope 2018
description: A React conference in Paris. There will be tons of croissants. The Eiffel Tower, the Champs Elysee. Classic French shit. and React.

name: Frontend United
description: Another Conference in the Netherlands, this one is 4 days long and will probably cover a wide range of topics. But the Vue conf will definitely be better.

name: JS Conf EU
description: Berlin, is awesome. Javascript is rad. This one will be an event to remember.
